name: Armenians of Colorado, Inc. (AOC)
address: P.O. Box 13854, Denver, CO 80202 (Mailing Address); 1373 Grant St, Suite 101A, Denver, Colorado 80202 (Office Address)
description: AOC is Colorado's oldest and largest Armenian organization, dedicated to cultural and educational programs. They foster a cohesive Armenian community and promote understanding of Armenian history, culture, language, and customs. They also support issues and concerns of the Armenian-American community and sponsor events and programs
services: Armenian-speaking Customs assistance in Colorado consultation

name: Armenian Apostolic Church of Colorado
